debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: One of the thing. Solar, I love solar, but solar doesn't quite have it yet. It's not powerful yet to -- to really run our big beautiful factories that we need to compete with the world. So -- False.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: So, it's all a pipe dream, but you know what we'll do, we're going to have the greatest economy in the world, but if you want to kill the economy, get rid of your oil industry. You want to -- and what about fracking?

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Kristen Welker
text: All right? Let me allow Vice President Biden to respond.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: I never said I oppose fracking.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You said on the tape.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Show the tape, put it on your web site.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: I'll put on.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Put it on the Web site. The fact of the matter is he's flatline.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Kristen Welker
text: Would you rule out banning fracking?

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: I do rule out banning fracking because the answer we need -- we need other industries to transition to get to ultimately a complete zero emissions by 2025. What I will do with fracking over time is make sure that we can capture the emissions from the fracking, capture the emissions from gas. We can do that and we can do that by investing money and doing it, but is a transition to that.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Kristen Welker
text: I have one more question on this --

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Excuse me, he was against fracking. He said it, I will show that to you tomorrow. I am against fracking until he got the nomination, went to Pennsylvania then he said, but you know what Pennsylvania, he'll be against it very soon because his party is totally against fracking.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Kristen Welker
text: Let me ask this final question in this section and then I want to move on to our final section. President Trump people of color are much more likely to live near oil refineries and chemical plants. In Texas, there are families who worry the plants near them are making them sick. Your administration has rolled back regulations on these kinds of facilities.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Kristen Welker
text: Why should these families give you another four years in office?

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: The families that we're talking about are employed heavily and they are making a lot of money, more money than they've ever made. If you look at the kind of numbers that we've produced for Hispanic or black for Asian, it's nine times greater the percentage gain than it was under in three years than it was under eight years of the two of them, to put it nicely.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Nine times more. Now, somebody lives, I have not heard the numbers or the statistic -- statistics that you're saying, but they're making a tremendous amount of money economically, we saved it. And I saved it again a number of months ago when oil was crashing because of the pandemic, we saved it. We got to say what you want about relationship.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: We got Saudi Arabia, Mexico, and Russia to cut back way back. We saved our oil industry and now it's very vibrant everybody has very inexpensive gasoline, remember that.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Kristen Welker
text: Vice President Biden, your response, and then we're going to have a final question for both of you.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: My response is that those people live on what they call a fence line. He don't understand this. They live near chemical plants that in fact pollute chemical plants and oil plants and refineries that pollute -- I used to live near that when I was growing up in Claymont, Delaware and all the more oil refineries in Marcus Hook in the Delaware River than there is anyplace, including in Houston at the time.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: When my mom get in the car and when -- when our first frost to drive me to school turned to the -- which were pretty big oil slick in the window. That's why so many people in my state were dying and getting cancer. The fact is those frontline communities, it doesn't matter what you're paying them, it matters how you keep them safe.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: What do you do and you impose restrictions on that pollutions that the pollutants coming out of those fence line communities.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Kristen Welker
text: OK, I have one final question.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Would you close down the other way?

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: I have a transition from the oil industry, yes.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Oh, a transition.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: That is a big statement. That's because I would stop. Because the oil industry pollutes significantly.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: I see.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Well, if you let me finish the statement. Because it has to be replaced by renewable energy over time, over time, and I'd stop giving to the oil industry, I'd stop giving them federal subsidies. He won't give federal subsidies to the gas, excuse me, to solar and, why are we giving it to oil industry?

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: We actually do to solar and wind. And that may be the biggest statement in terms of business. That's the biggest statement because basically what he's saying is he is going to destroy the oil industry. Will you remember that Texas? Will you remember that Pennsylvania, Oklahoma?

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Kristen Welker
text: Vice President Biden, let me give you 10 seconds to respond and I have to get to the final question. Vice President Biden.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: He takes everything out of context, but the point is, look, we have to move toward a net-zero emissions. The first place to do that by the year 2035 is an energy production by 2050 totally.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Kristen Welker
text: All right,

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Is he going to get China to do it? Is he going to get China to do it?

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Kristen Welker
text: We have to move on to our final question.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: No, I am going to rejoin Paris Accord and make China abide by what they agreed.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Kristen Welker
text: All right. This is about leadership, gentlemen. And this first question does go to you, President Trump. Imagine this is your inauguration day,what will you say in your address to America -- to Americans who did not vote for you? You'll each have one minute starting with you.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: We have to make a country totally successful as it was prior to the plague coming in from China. Now we're rebuilding it and we're doing record numbers, 11.4 million jobs in a short period of time etc. But I will tell you, go back, before the plague came in, just before I was getting calls from people that were not normally people they would call me, they wanted to get together.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: We had the best Black unemployment numbers in the history of our country, Hispanic, women, Asian, people with diplomas, with no diplomas, M.I.T graduates, No. 1 in the class, everybody had the best numbers and you know what the other side wanted to get together, they wanted to unify. Success is going to bring us together.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Donald Trump
text: We are on the road to success, but I'm cutting taxes and he wants to raise everybody's taxes and he wants to put new regulations on everything. He will kill it. If he gets in, you will have a depression, the likes of which you've never seen. Your 401(k)s will go to hell and it'll be a very, very sad day for this country.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Kristen Welker
text: All right. Vice President Biden, same question to you. What will you say during your inaugural address to Americans who did not vote for you?

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: I will say, I'm an American President, I represent all of you whether you voted for me or against me and I'm going to make sure that you're represented. I'm going to give you hope. We're going to move -- we're going to choose science over fiction. We're going to choose hope over fear. We're going to choose to move forward because we have enormous opportunities, enormous opportunities to make things better.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: We can grow this economy, we can deal with the systemic racism at the same time. We can make sure that our economy is being run and moved and motivated by clean energy, creating millions of new jobs and that's the fact, that's what we're going to do. And I'm going to say, as I said at the beginning, what is on the ballot here is the character of this country, decency, honor, respect treating people with dignity, making sure that everyone hasn't even changed, and I'm going to make sure you get that.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Joe Biden
text: You haven't been getting it the last four years.

debate_name: 2020 NBC News Presidential Debate at Belmont University in Nashville, Tennessee
speaker: Kristen Welker
text: All right, I want to thank you both for a very robust hour and a half. A fantastic debate. Really appreciate it. President Trump, Former Vice President Joe Biden. Thank you to Belmont University for hosting us tonight. And most importantly, thank you to those watching tonight. Election day is November 3rd, don't forget to vote.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Good evening from the Health Education Campus of Case Western Reserve University and the Cleveland Clinic. I'm Chris Wallace of Fox News. And I welcome you to the first of the 2020 Presidential Debates between President Donald J. Trump and former Vice President Joe Biden. This debate is sponsored by the Commission on Presidential Debates.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: This debate is being conducted under health and safety protocols designed by the Cleveland Clinic, which is serving as the health security advisor to the Commission for all four debates. Out of precaution, both campaigns have agreed that candidates will not shake hands at the beginning of tonight's debate.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: The audience here in the hall has promised to remain silent. No cheers, no boos, or other interruptions so we, and more importantly, you can focus on what the candidates have to say. No noise except right now, as we welcome the Republican nominee, President Trump, and the Democratic nominee, Vice President Biden.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Gentlemen, a lot of people have been waiting for this night. So let's get going. Our first subject is the Supreme Court. President Trump, you nominated Amy Coney Barrett over the weekend to succeed the late Ruth Bader Ginsburg on the court. You say the constitution is clear about your obligation and the Senate's to consider a nominee to the court.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Vice President Biden, you say that this is an effort by the president and Republicans to jam through an appointment and what you call an abuse of power. My first question to both of you tonight, why are you right in the argument you make and your opponent wrong? And where do you think a Justice Barrett would take the court?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: President Trump, in this first segment, you go first. Two minutes.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Thank you very much, Chris. I will tell you very simply, we won the election. Elections have consequences. We have the Senate, we have the White House and we have a phenomenal nominee, respected by all. Top, top academic. Good in every way. Good in every way. In fact, some of her biggest endorsers are very liberal people from Notre Dame and other places.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: So I think she's going to be fantastic. We have plenty of time, even if we did it after the election itself, I have a lot of time after the election, as you know. So I think that she will be outstanding. She's going to be as good as anybody that has served on that court. We really feel that. We have a professor at Notre Dame, highly respected by all, said she's the single greatest student he's ever had.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: He's been a professor for a long time at a great school. And we won the election and therefore we have the right to choose her. And very few people, knowingly, would say otherwise. And by the way, the Democrats, they wouldn't even think about not doing it. If they had, the only difference is, they would try and do it faster.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: There's no way they would give it up. They had Merrick Garland, but the problem is, they didn't have the election so they were stopped. And probably that would happen in reverse also, definitely would happen in reverse. So we won the election and we have the right to do it, Chris.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: President Trump, thank you. Same question to you, Vice President Biden. You have two minutes.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Well, first of all, thank you for doing this. And looking forward to this, Mr. President. The American people have a right to have a say in who the Supreme Court nominee is and that say occurs when they vote for a United States senator and when they vote for the President of the United States. They're not going to get that chance now because we're in the middle of an election already, election has already started.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Tens of thousands of people have already voted. And so the thing that should happen is we should wait. We should wait and see what the outcome of this election is because that's the only way the American people get to express their view, is by who they elect as president and who they elect as vice-president.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Now, what's at stake here is, the President's made it clear. He wants to get rid of the Affordable Care Act. He's been running on that. He ran on that and he's been governing on that. He's in the Supreme Court right now trying to get rid of the Affordable Care Act, which will strip 20 million people from having insurance, health insurance now if it goes into court.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: And the justice, and I have nothing, I'm not opposed to the justice. She seems like a very fine person, but she's written before she went on the bench, which is her right, that she thinks that the Affordable Care Act is not constitutional. The other thing that's on the court, and if it's struck down what happens, women's rights are fundamentally changed.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Once again, a woman could be held to pay more money because she has a preexisting condition of pregnancy. They're able to charge women more for the same exact procedure a man gets and that ended when we, in fact, passed the Affordable Care Act. And there's a hundred million people have preexisting conditions and they'll be taken away as well.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Those pre-existing conditions, insurance companies are going to love this. And so it's just not appropriate to do this before this election. If he wins the election and the Senate is Democrat or Republican, then he goes forward. If not, we should wait until February.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: There aren't a 100 million people with preexisting conditions. As far as the say is concerned, the people already had their say. Justice Ginsburg said very powerfully, very strongly at some point 10 years ago or so, she said a president and the Senate is elected for a period of time. But a president is elected for four years.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: We're not elected for three years. I'm not elected for three years. So we have the Senate, we have a president --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Who's elected to the next election.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: During that period of time, we have an opening. I'm not elected for three years; I'm elected for four years.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: The election's already started.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Joe, the 100 million people is totally wrong. I don't know where you got that number. The bigger problem that you have is that you're going to extinguish 180 million people with their private health care that they're very happy with.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: That's simply not true.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Well, you're suddenly going to socialist. You're going to socialist.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Gentlemen, we're now into open discussion.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Number one, he knows that what I proposed. What I proposed is that we expand Obamacare and we increase it. We do not wipe any, and one of the big debates we had with 23 of my colleagues trying to win the nomination that I won, were saying that Biden wanted to allow people to have private insurance still.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: They can, they do. They will under my proposal.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Not what you said. And it's not what your party is saying.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: That is simply a lie.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Your party wants to go socialist medicine.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: The party is me.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: And Socialist --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Right now, I am the Democratic party.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: And they are going to to dominate you, Joe, you know that.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: I am the democratic party right now. The platform of the democratic party --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Not according to Harris.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Is what I, in fact, approved of. What I approved of. Now, here's the deal. The deal is that it's going to wipe out pre-existing conditions. And by the way, the 200,000 people that have died on his watch. How many of those have survived? Well, there's 7 million people that contracted COVID. What does it mean for them going forward, if you strike down the Affordable Care Act?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Joe, you've had 308,000 military people dying because you couldn't provide them proper healthcare in the military. So don't tell me about this.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: I'm happy to talk about this.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: And if you were here, it wouldn't be 200, it would be 2 million people because you were very late on the draw. You didn't want me to ban China, which was heavily infected. You didn't want me to ban Europe.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: All right, gentlemen.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Which was heavily, you would have been much later, much later.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Mr. President.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: We're talking about two million people.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: You're not going to be able to shut him up.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: As a moderator, we are going to talk about COVID in the next segment, but go ahead.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Let me finish. The point is that the president also is opposed to Roe V. Wade. That's on the ballot as well and the court, in the court. And so that's also at stake right now. And so the election has already begun.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You don't know what's on the ballot. Why is it in the ballot?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Because --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Why is it on the ballot. It's not on the ballot.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: It's on the ballot in the court.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: I don't think so. There's nothing happening there.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Donald, would you just be quiet for a minute.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You don't know her view on Roe V. Wade. I don't know her view.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Well, all right. Let's all right. Let's talk. We've got a lot to unpack here, gentlemen. We've got a lot of time. So on healthcare and then we'll come back to Roe V. Wade.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: All right.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Mr. President, the Supreme Court will hear a case a week after the election in which the Trump administration, along with 18 state attorneys general are seeking to overturn Obamacare, to end Obamacare. You have spent the last week --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Because I want to give good healthcare.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: If I may ask my question, sir.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Good healthcare.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Over the last four years, you have promised to repeal and replace Obamacare, but you have never, in these four years, come up with a plan, a comprehensive plan, to replace Obamacare.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Of course, I have.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Well, I'll get to that. When I'm finished, I'm going to give you an opportunity --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Get rid of the individual mandate.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: I'm going to give you an opportunity.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: To get rid of the individual mandate, which was a big chunk of --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: That is not a comprehensive plan.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: That is absolutely a big thing. That was the worst part of Obamacare.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Sir.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Chris, that was the worst part of Obamacare.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Sir, you're debating him, not me. Let me ask my questions.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Well, I'll ask Joe.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: No.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: The individual mandate was the most unpopular aspect of Obamacare.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Mr. President. I'd like to --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: I got rid of it and we will protect people.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Mr. President, I'm the moderator of this debate. And I would like you to let me ask my question, and then you can answer --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Go ahead.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: You, in the course of these four years have never come up with a comprehensive plan to replace Obamacare. And just this last Thursday, you signed a largely symbolic executive order to protect people with pre-existing conditions five days before this debate. So my question, sir, is what is the Trump healthcare plan?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: First of all, I guess I'm debating you, not him, but that's okay. I'm not surprised. Let me just tell you something. There's nothing symbolic. I'm cutting drug prices. I'm going with favorite nations, which no president has the courage to do because you're going against big pharma. Drug prices will be coming down 80 or 90%. You could have done it during your 47 year period in government, but you didn't do it.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Nobody's done it. So we're cutting health care. All of the things that we've done, I give you an example. Insulin is going to, it was destroying families, destroying people, the cost. I'm getting it for so cheap. It's like water, you want to know the truth. So cheap. take a look at all of the drugs that what we're doing, prescription drug prices.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: We're going to allow our governors now to go to other countries to buy drugs because they paid just a tiny fraction.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: This is open discussion.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: But this is big stuff.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Sir, you'll be happy. I'm about to pick up on one of your points to ask the Vice President, which is he points out that you would like to add a public option to Obamacare, and the argument that he makes and other Republicans make, is that that is going to end private insurance.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: It is not.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Well, I'm asking the question and it will end --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: That's not what your party says, by the way.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: It will end private insurance and create a government takeover of healthcare.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: It does not. It's only for those people who are so poor, they qualify for Medicaid. They can get that free in most states, except governors who want to deny people who are poor Medicaid. Anyone who qualifies for Medicaid would automatically be enrolled in the public option. The vast majority of the American people would still not be in that option, number one.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Joe, you agree with Bernie Sanders, who's far left on the manifesto, we call it, that gives you socialized medicine.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Look, hey.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Are you saying you didn't agree?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: The fact of the matter is, I beat Bernie Sanders.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Not by much.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: I beat him a whole hell of a lot. I'm here. I'm here standing facing you, old buddy.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: If Pocahontas would have left two days early, you would have lost every primary --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: All he knows how to do --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: On Super Tuesday, you got very lucky.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Here's the deal. I got very lucky. I may get very lucky tonight as well. And tonight I'm going to make sure because here's the deal. Here's the deal. The fact is that everything he's saying so far is simply a lie. I'm not here to call out his lies. Everybody knows he's a liar. I just want to make sure, I want to make sure it lasts in it last night.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: First, I want, want to make sure --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Mr. President, can you let him finish, sir?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: No. He doesn't know how to do that.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You'd be surprised. You'd be surprised.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: You picked the wrong guy, the wrong night at the wrong time.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Listen, you agreed with Bernie Sanders.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Here's the deal.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Please let him speak, Mr. President.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Number two.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You just lost the left.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Number two.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You just lost the left. You agreed with Bernie Sanders on a plan, absolutely agreed to socialized medicine.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Folks, do you have any idea what this clown is doing?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Mr. President.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Socialized medicine.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Mr. President.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: I'll tell you what. He is not for any help for people needing healthcare --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Who, Bernie?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Because he, in fact, already has cost 10 million people their healthcare that they had from their employers because of his recession, number one. Number two, there are 20 million people getting healthcare through Obamacare now , yet he wants to take it away. He won't ever look you in the eye and say, that's what he wants to do.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Take it away.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: No. I want to give them better healthcare at a much lower price because Obamacare is no good.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: He doesn't know how. He doesn't know how to that.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: I've already fixed it.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: He has never offered a plan.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: I've already fixed it to an extent.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: He has never --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Obamacare, as you might know, but probably don't --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Gentlemen, you realize if you're both speaking at the same time. Let the president -- Go ahead, sir.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Obamacare is no good. We made it better. And I had a choice to make very early on. We took away the individual mandate. We guaranteed conditions, but took away the individual mandate. Listen, this is the way it is. And that destroyed ... they shouldn't even call it Obamacare. Then I had a choice to make, do I let my people run it really well or badly?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: If I run it badly, they'll probably blame him, but they'll blame me. But more importantly, I want to help people. Okay? I said, "You've got to run it so well." And I just had a meeting with them. They said, the problem is no matter how well you run Obamacare, it's a disaster. It's too expensive. Premiums are too high.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: That it doesn't work. We do want to get rid of it. Chris, We want to get rid of it.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: I understand that, sir, but I have to give you roughly equal time. Please let the Vice President talk.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: He has no plan for healthcare.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Of course, we do.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Please. He sends out wishful thinking. He has executive orders that have no power. He hasn't lowered drug costs for anybody. He's been promising a healthcare plan since he got elected. He has none, like almost everything else he talks about. He does not have a plan. He doesn't have a plan. And the fact is, this man doesn't know what he's talking about.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: I have one final question for you.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Sure.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Mr. Vice president, if Senate Republicans, we were talking originally about the Supreme Court here. If Senate Republicans go ahead and confirm Justice Barrett, there has been talk about ending the filibuster or even packing the court, adding to the nine justices there. You call this a distraction by the President.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: But in fact, it wasn't brought up by the President, it was brought up by some of your democratic colleagues in the Congress. So my question to you is you have refused in the past to talk about it. Are you willing to tell the American people tonight, whether or not you will support either ending the filibuster or packing the Court?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Whatever position I take on that, that'll become the issue. The issue is the American people should speak. You should go out and vote. You're in voting now, vote and let your senators know how strongly you feel.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Are you going to pack the court?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Vote now.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Are you going to pack the court?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Make sure you, in fact, let people know, your senators.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: He doesn't want to answer the question.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: I'm not going to answer the question.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Why wouldn't you answer that question?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Because the question is, the question is --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You want to put a lot of Supreme Court justices, radical left.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Would you shut up, man?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Listen. Who is on your list, Joe?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: This is so --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Gentlemen, I think we have ended this segment.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: This is so un-Presidential.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: He's going to pack the court. He's not going to give a list.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: No, no. We have ended the segment. We're going to move on to the second segment.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: That was really productive segment, wasn't it? Keep yapping, man.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: The people understand, Joe. 47 years, you've done nothing. They understand.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: The second subject is COVID-19, which is an awfully serious subject. So let's try to be serious about it. We have had more than seven million cases of Corona virus in the United States and more than 200,000 people have died. Even after we produce a vaccine, experts say that it could be months or even years before we come back to anything approaching normal.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: My question for both of you is, based on what you have said and done so far, and what you have said you would do starting in 2021, why should the American people trust you more than your opponent to deal with this public health crisis going forward? In this case, the question goes to you first, sir, two minutes, uninterrupted.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Good luck. 200,000 dead. As you said, over seven million infected in the United States. We, in fact, have 4% of the world's population, 20% of the deaths. 40,000 people a day are contracting COVID. In addition to that, about between 750 and a thousand people a day are dying. When he was presented with that number, he said, "It is what it is." Well, it is what it is because you are who you are.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: That's why it is. The President has no plan. He hasn't laid out anything. He knew all the way back in February how serious this crisis was. He knew it was a deadly disease. What did he do? He's on tape, he's acknowledging he knew it. He said he didn't tell us or give people a warning of it because he didn't want to panic the American people.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: You don't panic. He panicked. In addition to that, what did he do? He went in and we were insisting that the Chinese, the people we had on the ground in China should be able to go to Wuhan and determine for themselves how dangerous this was. He did not even ask Xi to do that. He told us what a great job Xi was doing.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: He said, we owe him a debt of gratitude for being so transparent with us. And what did he do then? He then did nothing. He waited and waited and waited. He still doesn't have a plan.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Wrong.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: I laid out back in March --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Sir, it's his two minutes.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Exactly what we should be doing. And I laid out again in July, what we should be doing. We should be providing all the protective gear possible. We should be providing the money the House has passed in order to be able to go out and get people the help they need to keep their businesses open, open schools, that cost a lot of money.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: You should get out of your bunker and get out of the sand trap and get in your golf course and go in the Oval Office and bring together the Democrats and Republicans and fund what needs to be done now to save lives.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: So if we would have listened to you --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: You have two minutes, sir.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: If we would have listened to you, the country would have been left wide open, millions of people would have died, not 200,000. And one person is too much. It's China's fault. It should've never happened. They stopped it from going in, but it was China's fault. And by the way, when you talk about numbers, you don't know how many people died in China.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You don't know how many people died in Russia. You don't know how many people died in India. They don't exactly give you a straight count, just so you understand. But if you look at what we've done, I closed it. And you said, he's xenophobic. He's a racist, and he's xenophobic, because you didn't think I should have closed our country.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Wait a minute. It's his two minutes.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You didn't think we should have closed our country because you thought it was too, it was terrible. You wouldn't have closed it for another two months. By my doing it early, in fact, Dr. Fauci said, President Trump saved thousands of lives. Many of your Democrat governors said, "President Trump did a phenomenal job." We worked with the governor.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Oh really, go take a look. The governors said, I did a phenomenal job. Most of them said that. In fact, people that would not be necessarily on my side, said that. President Trump did a phenomenal job. We did. We got the gowns. We got the masks. We made the ventilators. You wouldn't have made ventilators.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: And now we're weeks away from a vaccine. We're doing therapeutics already. Fewer people are dying when they get sick. Far fewer people are dying. We've done a great job. The only thing I haven't done a good job, and that's because of the fake news, no matter what you say to them, they give you a bad press on it.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: It's just fake news. They give you good press. They give me bad press because that's the way it is, unfortunately. But let me just tell you something, I don't care. I've gotten used to it. But I'll tell you, Joe, you could never have done the job that we did. You don't have it in your blood. You could have never done that, Joe.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: I know how to do the job. I know how to get the job done. Well, you didn't do very well in swine flu. H1N1, you were a disaster. Your own Chief of Staff said you were a disaster.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: 14,000 people died not 200,000. There was no economic recession.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: You made a point, let him answer it. And there was no one ... We didn't shut down the economy. This is his economy that he shut down. The reason it shut down is because, look, you folks at home. How many of you got up this morning and had an empty chair at the kitchen table because someone died at COVID?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: How many of you are in a situation where you lost your mom or dad and you couldn't even speak to them, you had a nurse holding a phone up so you could in fact say goodbye?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You would have lost far more people, far more people. And you would have been months late.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: And by the way, his own CDC director says we could lose as many as another 200,000 people between now and the end of the year. And he said, if we just wear a mask, we can save half those numbers. Just a mask. And by the way, in terms of the whole notion of a vaccine, we're for a vaccine, but I don't trust him at all.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Nor do you. I know you don't. What we trust is a scientist.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You don't trust Johnson and Johnson, Pfizer?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: We trust Dr. Fauci.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Okay, gentlemen, let me move on to questions about the future because you both have touched on two of the questions I'm going to ask. Focusing on the future first, President Trump, you have repeatedly either contradicted or been at odds with some of your government's own top scientists. The week before last, the head of the Centers for Disease Control, Dr.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Redfield, said it would be summer before the vaccine would become generally available to the public. You said that he was confused and mistaken. Those were your two words, but Dr. Slowey, the head of your operation Warp Speed has said exactly the same thing. Are they both wrong?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: I've spoken to the companies and we can have it a lot sooner. It's a very political thing because people like this would rather make it political than save lives. It is a very political thing. Political than save lives. It is a very political thing. I've spoken to Pfizer. I've spoken to all of the people that you have to speak to.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Moderna, Johnson & Johnson and others. They can go faster than that by a lot, become very political because the left or I don't know If I can call them left, I don't know what they're called.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: You're suggesting that the head of your Operation Warp Speed, Dr.Slaoui -- I disagree with him. No, I disagree with both them. And he didn't say that. He said it could be there, but it could also be much sooner. I had him in my office two days ago.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: He talked about the summer sir, before it's generally available, just like Dr.Redfield. He said it's a possibility that we'll have the answer before November 1st. It could also be after that.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: I'm talking about when it's generally available. Well, we're going to deliver it right away. We have the military all set up. Logistically, they're all set up. We have our military that delivers soldiers and they can do 200,000 a day. They're going to be delivering --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: This is the same man who told you -- It's all set up.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: By Easter, this would be gone away. By the warm weather, it'd be gone. Miraculous like a miracle. And by the way, maybe you could inject some bleach in your arm and that would take care of it. This is the same man -- That was said sarcastically, you know that. That was said sarcastically.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: And so here's the deal. This man is talking about a vaccine. Every serious company is talking about maybe having a vaccine done by the end of the year. But the distribution of that vaccine will not occur until sometime beginning of the middle of next year to get it out. If we get the vaccine and pray God, we will.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Mr. Vice president, I want to pick up --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You'll have the vaccine sooner than that. I want to pick up on this question though. You say the public can trust the scientists, but they can't trust President Trump. In fact, you said that again tonight. Your running mate, Senator Harris goes further saying, "The public health experts will be muzzled, will be suppressed." Given the fact that polls already show that people are concerned about the vaccine and are reluctant to take it, are you and your running mate, Senator Harris contributing to that fear?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: No more than the question you just asked him. You pointed out, he puts pressure and disagrees with his own scientists. But you're saying you can't --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Everybody knows -- Or Senator Harris is saying you can't trust the scientists.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: No, no. You can trust the scientists. She didn't say that. You can trust the scientists. She said, "The public health experts quote, will be muzzled, will be suppressed."

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Well, that's what he's going to try to do. But there's there's thousands of scientists out there, like here at this great hospital, that don't work for him. Their job doesn't depend on him. That's not... They're the people and by the way --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: I spoke to the scientists that are in charge. They will have the vaccine very soon.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Let him finish.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Do you believe for a moment, what he's telling you in light of all the lies he's told you about the whole issue relating to COVID. He still hasn't even acknowledged that he knew this was happening, knew how dangerous this was going to be, back in February. And he didn't even tell you. He's on record as saying it.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: He panicked or he just looked at the stock market, one of the two, because guess what? A lot of people died and a lot more are going to die unless he gets a lot smarter, a lot quicker.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Mr.President.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Did you use the word smart? So you said you went to Delaware state, but you forgot the name of your college. You didn't go to Delaware state, you graduated either the lowest or almost the lowest in your class. Don't ever use the word smart with me. Don't ever use that word.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Oh, give me a break.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Because you know what, there's nothing smart about you, Joe. 47 years, you've done nothing.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Let's have this debate, we'll see who's smart.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: If you would have had... Let me just tell you something, Joe. If you would have had the charge of what I was put through, I had to close the greatest economy in the history of our country. And by the way, now it's being built again. It's going up fast.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: We're going to get to the economy in the next segment, sir.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Okay. It's going up fast.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: When it comes to how the virus has been handled so far, the two of you have taken very different approaches and this is going to affect how the virus is handled going forward by whichever of you ends up becoming the next president. I want to quickly go through several of those. Reopenings, Vice President Biden.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: You have been much more reluctant than President Trump about reopening the economy and the schools. Why sir?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Because he doesn't have a plan. If I were running, I'd know what the plan is. You've got to provide these businesses the ability to have the money to be able to reopen with the PPE as well as with the sanitation they need. You have to provide them --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Tell that to Nancy Pelosi.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Will he just shush for a minute.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump

speaker: Joe Biden
text: By the way, Nancy Pelosi and Schumer, they have a plan. He won't even meet with them. The Republicans won't meet with the Senate. And he sits in his golf course. Literally, think about it.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You probably play more than I do, Joe.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: I've got to respond to that.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Those states are not doing well, that are shut down.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Gentlemen, I want to move on to another subject.

speaker: Joe Biden
text: I've got to respond to that.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: He wants to shut down the whole country. President Trump, you have begun to increasingly question the effectiveness of masks as a disease preventer. And in fact, recently you have cited the issue of waiters touching their mouths and touching plates. Are you questioning the efficacy of masks?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

text: Okay, let me ask --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

text: People with masks --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: We've had no negative effect.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump

speaker: Joe Biden
text: Because it costs a lot of money to open them safely. They were going to give... His administration was going to give the teachers in school, students, masks. debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Nothing. They're closing. One in six is now gone. He ought to get on the job and take care of the needs of the American people, so we can open safely.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: All right. Your time is up, sir. We are going to get to --

speaker: Donald Trump

It's so sad, what's happening in New York. It's almost like a ghost town and I'm not sure it can ever recover what they've done in New York. People want their places open.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: People want to be safe.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: They'll be careful, but they want their schools open.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

speaker: Donald Trump

text: Sir, I'm asking you a specific question, which is --

speaker: Donald Trump
text: Well let me tell you.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Millions of dollars.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

text: Okay, gentlemen.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Yeah, you got it done.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Mr. President --

speaker: Joe Biden

speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Mr. President, let me pick up on that. You would continue your free market approach, lower taxes, more deregulation, correct?

speaker: Joe Biden

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: But let me --

speaker: Donald Trump
text: Excuse me.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: I do want to talk about this issue of law and order though, and in the joint recommendation that came from the Biden-Bernie Sanders task force, you talked about "reimagining policing." speaker: Joe Biden
text: Look, what I support is the police having the opportunity to deal with the problems they face. I'm totally opposed to defunding the police offices. As a matter of fact, local police. The only one defunding, and his budget calls for a $400 million cut in local law enforcement assistance. They need more assistance.

text: He's Putin's puppy. He still refuses to even say anything to Putin about the bounty on the heads of American soldiers.

speaker: Donald Trump
text: Your son got

speaker: Donald Trump
