speaker: Chris Wallace
text: All right --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Excuse me Chris, when you have 80 million ballots --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Gentlemen I have a final question --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: ...sending in swamping the system. You know, it can't be done. You know, it can't, and already there has been fraud

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: All right, so now Wait a minute, gentlemen, final question. In eight states... We can keep talking. In eight States, election workers are prohibited currently by law, eight states, from even beginning to process ballots. Even take them out of the envelopes and flatten them until election day.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: That means that it's likely because there's going to be a huge increase in Mail-in balloting, that we are not going to know on election night, who the winner is that it could be days. It could be weeks.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: It'd be months.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Until we find out who the new President is. So first for you, sir, finally, for the Vice President, I hope neither of you will interrupt the other. Will you urge your supporters to stay calm during this extended period, not to engage in any civil unrest? And will you pledge tonight that you will not declare victory until the election has been independently certified?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: President Trump, you go first.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: I'm urging my supporters to go into the polls and watch very carefully because that's what has to happen. I am urging them to do it. As you know today, there was a big problem. In Philadelphia, they went into watch. They were called poll watchers, a very safe, very nice thing. They were thrown out. They weren't allowed to watch, you know why?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Because bad things happen in Philadelphia, bad things. And I am urging my people. I hope it's going to be a fair election. If it's a fair election, --

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: You are urging them what?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: I am a hundred percent on board. But if I see tens of thousands of ballots being manipulated, I can't go along with that. And I'll tell you what?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: But what I was asking does that mean you are going to tell your people to take to the streets?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: From a common-sense... I'll tell you what it means. It means you have a fraudulent election.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: And what would you do about that?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: You are sending out 80 million ballots. These people aren't equipped to handle it, number one. Number two, they cheat. They cheat. Hey, they found ballots in a wastepaper basket three days ago and they all had the name military ballots. There were military. They all had the name Trump on them. You think that's good?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Vice President Biden, final question for you. Will you urge your supporters to stay calm while the vote is counted? And will you pledge not to declare victory until the election is independently certified?

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: Yes. And here's the deal? They count the balance, as you pointed out, some of these ballots in some States can't even be opened until election day. And if there's thousands of ballots going to take time to do it. And by the way, our military, they've been voting by ballots at the end of the civil war in effect.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: And that is what's happened going to happen. Why was it not? Why is it for them somehow not fraudulent? It's the same process. It's honest. No one has established at all that there is fraud related to mail-in ballots. That somehow it's a fraudulent process.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: It's already been established. Take a look at Carolyn Maloney's race.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: I asked you, you had an opportunity to respond. Go ahead.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: Look at Carolyn Maloney. They have no idea

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Vice President Biden, go ahead. Yeah.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: He has no idea what he's talking about. Here's the deal. The fact is I will accept it and he will too. You know why? Because once the winner is declared after all the ballots are counted, all the votes are counted. That'll be the end of it. That'll be the end of it. And if it's me, in fact, fine. If it's not me, I'll support the outcome.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Joe Biden
text: And I'll be a President, not just for the Democrats. I'll be a President for Democrats and Republicans. And this guy,

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: I want to see an honest ballot count.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: Gentlemen, to say, that's the end of it. This is the end of this debate.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Donald Trump
text: I want to see an honest ballot count, and I think he does too.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: We're going to leave it there to be continued, as in more debates, as we go on. President Trump, Vice President Biden, it's been an interesting hour and a half. I want to thank you both for participating in the first of three debates that you have agreed to engage in. We want to thank Case Western Reserve University and the Cleveland Clinic for hosting this event.

debate_name: 2020 Fox News Presidential Debate at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio
speaker: Chris Wallace
text: The next debate sponsored by the Commission on Presidential Debates will be one week from tomorrow, October 7th at the University of Utah in Salt Lake City. The two Vice Presidential nominees, Vice President Mike Pence and Senator Kamala Harris will debate at 9:00 PM Eastern that night. We hope you'll watch it. Until then, thank you, and good night.
